This session includes tutorials about basic concepts of Machine Learning using 
Keras.

- [Image Classification](/tutorials/beginners/basic-ml/tutorial_basic_classification/): image classification using the Fashing MNIST dataset.
- [Regression](/tutorials/beginners/basic-ml/tutorial_basic_regression/): regression using the Boston Housing dataset.
- [Text Classification](/tutorials/beginners/basic-ml/tutorial_basic_text_classification/): text classification using the IMDB dataset.
- [Overfitting and Underfitting](/tutorials/beginners/basic-ml/tutorial_overfit_underfit/): learn about these inportant concepts in ML.
- [Save and Restore](/tutorials/beginners/basic-ml/tutorial_save_and_restore/): learn how to save and restore TensorFlow models.
